comments:
Using 0730, I got the following stack trace when I tried to share a new project.

java.util.ConcurrentModificationException: concurrent access to HashMap
attempted by Thread[ModalContext,6,main]
	at java.lang.Throwable.<init>(Throwable.java)
	at java.lang.Throwable.<init>(Throwable.java)
	at java.util.HashMap.onEntry(HashMap.java)
	at java.util.HashMap.rehash(HashMap.java)
	at java.util.HashMap.put(HashMap.java)
	at java.util.HashSet.add(HashSet.java)
	at
org.eclipse.team.internal.ui.sync.views.SyncSetChangedEvent.added(SyncSetChangedEvent.java)
	at org.eclipse.team.internal.ui.sync.views.SyncSet.add(SyncSet.java)
	at org.eclipse.team.internal.ui.sync.views.SyncSetInput.collect(SyncSetInput.java)
	at
org.eclipse.team.internal.ui.sync.views.SyncSetInputFromSubscriber.fetchInput(SyncSetInputFromSubscriber.java:97)
	at org.eclipse.team.internal.ui.sync.views.SyncSetInput.reset(SyncSetInput.java:51)
	at
org.eclipse.team.internal.ui.sync.views.SyncSetInputFromSubscriber.initialize(SyncSetInputFromSubscriber.java:75)
	at
org.eclipse.team.internal.ui.sync.views.SubscriberInput.prepareInput(SubscriberInput.java:60)
	at org.eclipse.team.internal.ui.sync.views.SyncViewer$7.run(SyncViewer.java:463)
	at
org.eclipse.jface.operation.ModalContext$ModalContextThread.run(ModalContext.java:101)
I use SC as a JVM.
This code has been refactored in M3 to be thread safe.

traces.message: concurrent access to HashMap attempted by Thread[ModalContext,6,main]
